Text: Works, but they packed it like idiots. They split a 3 meg file into two rar files in two separate folders. But the thing is, these .rar files won't open by themselfs becasue they are actually part of the same archive so you need to rename the extension of the second .rar file to .r00 and then drag it to the same dir of the first rar file then make sure the file names (minus the extensions are the same) to extract.
